description.label: Description
description.value: This is one of the most perfidious Skaven spells. You conjure Warp magic into your eyes and imagine the disease you would like to spread, choosing from Black Plague or Ratte Fever (see WFRP4 p186). Then, gazing upon a single target in range, you unleash your disease upon them. The target is allowed an Average (+20) Endurance Test to resist contracting the disease. Targets rarely understand what has happened, and even once the disease takes hold, the victim may not realize the cause is magical.

lore.label: Lore
lore.effect: Warp Sorcerers gain a +10 bonus to Channelling and Language (Magick) Tests in any underground environment, such as a cavern, sewer or even a basement. Targets who suﬀer Wounds from Warp Lore spells must pass an Average (+20) Endurance Test to avoid contracting a Minor Infection.

wind.value: For every +2 SL, you may increase the Diﬃculty of the Endurance Test by one step (ie, from Average to Challenging).
